code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import"./Orders.css";import{db}from"../firebase";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Orders=_ref=>{let{user}=_ref;const[orders,setOrders]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{if(user){const fetchOrders=async()=>{try{const ordersSnapshot=await db.collection("users").doc(user===null||user===void 0?void 0:user.uid).collection("orders").orderBy("created","desc").get();const fetchedOrders=ordersSnapshot.docs.map(doc=>({id:doc.id,...doc.data()}));setOrders(fetchedOrders);}catch(error){console.error("Error fetching orders:",error);}};fetchOrders();}},[user]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"orders",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"order_title",children:"Your Orders"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"order_container",children:orders.length>0?orders.map(order=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"order",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"order_id",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Order:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h5",{children:order.id})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h3",{children:["Date: ",new Date(order.created*1000).toLocaleString()]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"order_items",children:order.basket.map((item,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"order_item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:item.image,alt:item.title},index),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{class:"order_details",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:item.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h4",{children:["Price: R",item.price]})]})]},index))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"order_total",children:["Order Total: R",(order.amount/100).toFixed(2)]})]},order.id)):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"No orders found"})})]});};export default Orders;
